= sudo write =
* :w !sudo tee %

= display unprintable characters =
* :set list

= cmdline window =
* q:

= build =
* ./configure --enable-pythoninterp

= ycm =
* macos
    * ./install.py --clang-completer --system-libclang --omnisharp-completer
* linux
    * require gcc 4.9
    * ./install.py --clang-completer
